description.narrative: The Ministry of Defense Advisors (MoDA) program partners senior Department of Defense (DoD) civilian experts with foreign counterparts to improve ministerial capacity. A MoDA is assisting the Fijian Ministry of Defense with defense planning reform initiatives. Long-term defense capacity building objectives are being achieved.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date
